docs.title: RAFGSA Regulatory Library
docs.text:
Welcome to the public Regulatory Library for the Royal Air Force Gliding & Soaring Association (RAFGSA).

This site presents the authoritative Handbook, Operations Manual, Annexes and standard Forms. It also provides a downloadable PDF copy generated automatically on each published update.

Last updated automatically when changes are approved.

docs.title: About
docs.text: This library mirrors the structure of the RAFGSA Handbook and Operations Manual and is designed for public access.
